ygData.subject: Re: *sigh* another death for Gilerrin
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, unfortunately zoning isn t absolute. If your HPs are low enough when you THINK you zoned, baddies may still get a few more hits before you are actually
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, unfortunately zoning isn't absolute. If your
HPs are low enough when you THINK you zoned, baddies
may still get a few more hits before you are actually
gone. This, as Gilerrin, I and many others have found,
can be fatal and extremely bothersome because we
actually ESCAPED. The worst part about this is that the
Almighty GMs can't do a thing about it. No rezzes, no
nothing =( <br><br>Trellan Hawksight, Wood Elf Ranger of
20 seasons<br><br>P.S. Happy Love Bracers?!?!
ROFLMAO!!!
